content:
Write me the content outline for the second article topic, "Understanding Building Regulations: A Key Element of Your Pre-Construction Checklist". Remember the target persona we identified and the information about myself.

The article should have a minimum of 800 to 1,300 word count. Identify the word count for each heading of the content outline and identify the proper H1, H2, H3, and so on and so forth.

Provide your answer in a markdown format.
